sentences.en: An astronaut will attempt to leave the stationary spaceship and then return to it.
sentences.cn: 一名宇航员将试着离开停着的宇宙飞船,然后再回到里面去.

sentences.en: Astronaut Michael Good rides Atlantis'remote manipulator system arm during a spacewalk.
sentences.cn: 宇航员迈克尔良好乘坐亚特兰蒂斯'遥控系统手臂一次太空行走中.

sentences.en: Astronaut Pierre Thuot tried to latch the 15-foot robotic arm onto the satellite.
sentences.cn: 宇航员皮埃尔·索特想要把这个长15英尺的机械手安到人造卫星上。

sentences.en: But he had a dream of being an astronaut.
sentences.cn: 一名澳大利亚人,梅森先生被控欠债!

sentences.en: But we've never lost an astronaut in flight; we've never had a tragedy like this.
sentences.cn: 然而我们从未在飞行中丧失过宇航员, 从未经历过这样的灾难.

sentences.en: Do you know how an astronaut flies in a spacecraft?
sentences.cn: 你知道宇航员是怎样乘宇宙飞船飞行的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Have you ever wanted to be an astronaut?
sentences.cn: 你曾想成为一个宇航员吗？

sentences.en: It made him China's first astronaut and the 241 st person in space.
sentences.cn: 这一壮举使他成为中国首名宇航员和全世界第241人进入太空的人.

sentences.en: Many different qualities go towards the making of an astronaut.
sentences.cn: 一名宇航员必须具备许多不同的素质。

sentences.en: My son's dream is to be an astronaut.
sentences.cn: 我儿子的理想是当宇航员.

sentences.en: Rick Husband was a boy of four when he an astronaut.
sentences.cn: 李克·哈慈邦德还只是个四岁的孩子时就立志长大当一名宇航员.

sentences.en: So why become an astronaut at all?
sentences.cn: 那么，为什么要成为一名宇航员呢？

sentences.en: The astronaut accepted danger was part of the job.
sentences.cn: 太空人承认他们的工作中包含著危险.

sentences.en: The astronaut accepts danger as being part of the job.
sentences.cn: 宇航员承认他们的工作中包含着危险.

sentences.en: The astronaut walked out of his ship and onto the moon's surface.
sentences.cn: 宇航员走出飞船踏上了月球表面.

sentences.en: The astronaut was welcomed with joyous , resounding acclaim.
sentences.cn: 人们欢声雷动地迎接那位宇航员.

sentences.en: The name of the Russian astronaut who performed this feat was Leonov.
sentences.cn: 建立这一功绩的苏联宇航员名叫雷诺夫.

sentences.en: The rocket boosts the astronaut into space.
sentences.cn: 这火箭能把宇航员送入太空.

sentences.en: Yes, I have wanted to be an astronaut.
sentences.cn: 是的，我想过成为一个宇航员。

words.tran_cn: 宇航的；太空航行学的；航天员的（等于astronautic）
天文学上地；宇航学地；天体地
太空航行；[航] 天文导航
[航]宇航员，航天员；太空旅行者

trans.tran_en: someone who travels and works in a spacecraft
